response.explain: Since this is the first step, there is no previous error or code to explain. The task is to install an alarm system. The alarm system is currently on the outside of the building and the robot is not holding anything.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the alarm system
(2) Grasp the alarm device
(3) Move.
(4) Put the alarm condition.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
